publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3281 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Kirkintilloch High School—That the Parliament congratulates Kirkintilloch High School for its progress, having been praised in the excellent follow-up report from HM Inspectorate of Education for the exemplary leadership given by the acting head, significant improvements in the consistency of young people’s learning experience and greatly improved staff confidence and moral.

S3M-3281 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Kirkintilloch High School—That the Parliament congratulates Kirkintilloch High School for its progress, having been praised in the excellent follow-up report from HM Inspectorate of Education (HMIE) for the exemplary leadership given by the acting head, significant improvements in the consistency of young people’s learning experience and greatly improved staff confidence and moral. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Jackson Carlaw*
S3M-3281 Congratulations to Kirkintilloch High School (lodged on 20 January 2009) Jim Tolson*, Bob Doris*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*
S3M-3281 Congratulations to Kirkintilloch High School (lodged on 20 January 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*
